_description: ‘Cloþyngge color and question’ — four monorhyming lines in a Latin sermon Quare rubrum est indumentum tuum?

CULIi38.Transcription:
in cloþyngge ys lyue y hydin þe color ys loue y kydIn
                    þe question ys askydWhy al þus ys by tyd
CULIi38.Editions:
Stemmler,  Theo. 
             “More English Texts from MS. Cambridge University Library
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Anglia
         93 (1975): 1-16: 11.
